summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CastingKart Financial Master Planner - an investor-grade financial planning application with 8 screens, real-time calculations, and Excel export functionality

minor_issues.issue: Accepts invalid inputs (negative values) without validation

ui_bugs.issue: Content may be hidden in tablet view (768px width)

passed_tests: Master Inputs screen - all input fields functional
Revenue Breakdown screen - charts and tables display
Key Metrics Dashboard - VC-style metrics display
Scenario Comparison screen - comparison charts work
Excel Export button present and accessible
Input field interactions (dropdowns, sliders, number inputs)
